## 12. 
### a. 

$$
P(X_{(7)} \leq 3) = \sum_7^{20}{20\choose{k}}(0.3)^{k}(1-0.3)^{20-{k}}
$$

```{r}
sum(dbinom(size = 20,prob = 0.3,x=c(7:20)))
```

###b. 

$$
P(X_{(8)} \geq 5) = 1- \sum_8^{20}{20\choose{k}}(0.4)^{k}(1-0.4)^{20-{k}}
$$

```{r}
1 - sum(dbinom(size = 20,prob = 0.4,x=c(8:20)))
```

###c. 

$$
P(X_{(20)} \leq 7) = \sum_{20}^{20}{20\choose20}(0.2)^{k}(1-0.2)^{20-k} = (0.2)^{20}
$$

```{r}
sum(dbinom(size = 20,prob = 0.2,x=c(20)))
(0.2)^20
```

###d. 

$$
P(X_{(4)} = 3) = \sum_4^{20}{20\choose{k}}(((0.3)^{k}(1-0.3)^{20-k}) - ((0.2)^{k}(1-0.2)^{20-k}))
$$

```{r}
sum(dbinom(size = 20,prob = 0.3,x=c(4:20)) - dbinom(size = 20,prob = 0.2,x=c(4:20)))
```
